hero.subheader: Nobody wants to go eat at a dining hall only to find that there are no places to sit. With Flux real-time data reporting, you can now avoid crowded dining halls and find the best places and times to eat on campus.

1.title: Browse.
1.description: Filter dining halls by location or crowdedness.

2.title: Plan.
2.description: Know ahead of time the best places to be.
